questions.question: The forest zone in Nigeria that is dominated by climbing and training plants is
The major reason for the conversion of a piece of land into a forest reserve is to _____
The following are effects of deforestation except that it reduces ______.
When crops produced from Nigeria are exported to other countries, they attract _____.
Which of the following factors causes low price of agricultural products in the market?
When a tomato farmer informs the public through radio broadcast about his newly produced tomato paste, he is said to have _____ his produce.
Farm produce are packaged to _____.
options: ensure availability of produce where such is not found
increase the production cost of farmer
save the farmer the stress of moving production
questions.answer: ensure availability of produce where such is not found

questions.question: Which of the following farm animal should be allowed to creep feed?
Farm animals can be infected with diseases through the following means except
Which of the following disease can be transmitted to poultry by stale feed contaminated feed and water?
A poultry farmer was advised to dispose all his sick old stock and sanitize the poultry house before the arrival of his new purchase stock. What might be the reason for the advice? To
options: avoid pecking and cannibalism in the farm
meet up with the seasonal market demand
raise more capital for the new purchase
reduce the spread of disease in the farm
questions.answer: reduce the spread of disease in the farm

questions.question: Viral diseases of animals are mainly controlled by _______.
Forest trees serve as wind break on the farm land because it _______.
options: assist in reducing evaporation of soil water
helps in purifying the atmospheric air
prevents wind erosion and desert encroachment
questions.answer: prevents wind erosion and desert encroachment

Tikka is a disease of ______.

instruction: Use this information below to answer question 32 – 33. If 600 birds were infected by a disease organism and 400 out of the infected birds died within one week before the arrival of the veterinary doctor while the remaining 200 birds looked dull and weak.

questions.question: Which of the following advices will not be given by a veterinary doctor on the husbandman?
options: Administer drugs to the survived birds

questions.question: Which of the following management practices could have prevented the infection in the farm from onset?
Rinderpest is referred to as ______.
Which of the following is not a symptom of animal disease?
The practice of keeping a dipping vat at the entrance of a brooder house is done in order to
options: help chicks digest the feed provided
increase the number of chicks hatched
minimize the rate of feed wastage
minimize the spread of poultry disease
questions.answer: minimize the spread of poultry disease

questions.question: An organism which lives on or inside of farm animal and depends on the animal for food and shelter is known as ________.
Acaricide is used in controlling
Liver fluke is a parasite of the following animal except
Which of the following farm produce cannot be processed and preserved for a long time?
Criteria used in classifying farm animals include the following except
options: how they reproduce and feed their young one’s
the composition of the feed they eat
the type of stomach they have
questions.answer: the composition of the feed they eat

questions.question: Which of the following workers does agriculture empower economically?

Use the information: A group of Akoko community women pooled their resources together in order to purchase and process palm nut oil for export. They later agreed after two years to continue as a formal association in the business dually registered.
What type of cooperative will the Akoko community women association be referred to?
Which of the following aims will not be in the interest of the newly formed Akoko community cooperatives? To
options: achieve a better price for palm nut oil
attain the groups set goals and objectives
facilitate production of quality palm nut oil
